pageContext.display_address: 215 N. Mason St., Fort Collins, CO 80524
pageContext.geocode_address: 215 N Mason St, Fort Collins, CO 80524, USA
pageContext.public_note: This course is for seniors and the kids in their family to work together. Kids must be at least 5 years old and need to be accompanied by an adult.  All registration is through the City of Fort Collins Senior Center.
pageContext.action_url_comment: Registration for all City of Fort Collins camps opens early May 2019. Click the "Register" button to be directed to their site.
